in.fissionlabs.kpinsights.service

Interface AdminService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdminServiceImpl

    public interface AdminService

    Service class to perform below user services :

    • Create role
    • Display role
    • Update role
    • Delete role
    • Display all roles
    • Create group
    • Display group
    • Update group
    • Delete group
    • Display all groups
    Author:
    bismoy
